mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yt.c_address (address_id, e_name, telephone, full_address, zip_code, e_address, openid,state) VALUES(UUID(), #{e_name}, #{telephone}, #{full_address}, #{zip_code}, #{e_address}, #{openid},'1')
mapper.select: SELECT address.* FROM yt.c_userinfo userinfo RIGHT JOIN yt.c_address address ON address.openid=userinfo.openid WHERE userinfo.openid=#{openid}
mapper.update: UPDATE yt.c_address SET e_name = #{e_name} , telephone = #{telephone} , full_address = #{full_address} , zip_code = #{zip_code} , e_address = #{e_address} WHERE address_id = #{address_id}
